title: Planet
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Indian, Japanese, Organic, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small cafe and store with limited space. Menu contains several choices for vegans and vegetarians. Try the Indian vegetable curry with organic brown rice or vegetable pizza (can order without cheese). Drinks include teas and house-made drinks. Desserts include vegan cake and a soy yogurt with pineapple syrup. Store sells a variety of locally made art.
